nodes.bodyText: Doesn't the adapter reset the time automatically? If memory serves me correctly that's done on the server-side.
It does for the auth server, but not for the adapter container because there needs to be a Filter deployed and Before/After methods are not aware of the URL on which Filter operates.
Thanks for the explanation. LGTM then. I'll let @hmlnarik merge this one though, since I clearly lack knowledge on the adapter testing side ;)
